com.ikalagaming.core.packages

Class PluginDescription

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ikalagaming.core.packages.PluginDescription

  • public class PluginDescription
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains data about a particular plugin.
    Author:
    Ches Burks

    • Constructor Detail

      • PluginDescription

        public PluginDescription(java.io.InputStream stream)
                  throws InvalidDescriptionException
        Returns a plugin description loaded by the given inputstream.
        Parameters:
        stream - the steam to load info from
        Throws:
        InvalidDescriptionException - if the description is not valid

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the plugin. Names are unique for each plugin. The name can contain the following characters:
        • a-z
        • 0-9
        • period
        • hyphen
        • underscore
        Returns:
        the name of the plugin

      • getVersion

        public double getVersion()
        The version of the plugin. This value is a double that follows the MajorVersion.MinorVersion format. It should be increased when new features are added or bugs are fixed.
        Returns:
        the version of the plugin

      • getMain

        public java.lang.String getMain()
        The fully qualified name of the main method for the plugin. This includes the class name. The format should follow the ClassLoader.loadClass(String) syntax. Typically this will be the class that implements Plugin.
        Returns:
        the absolute path to the main method of the plugin

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        This is a short human-friendly description of what the plugin does. It may be multiple lines.
        Returns:
        the plugins description

      • getAuthors

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAuthors()
        Returns the list of authors for the program. This is used to give credit to developers.
        Returns:
        the list of authors for the plugin

      • getDependencies

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDependencies()
        Returns a list of plugins this plugin requires in order to run. Use the value of getName() for the target plugin to specify it in the dependencies. If any plugin in this list is not found, this plugin will fail to load at startup. If multiple plugins list each other in depend, and they create a circular dependency, none of the plugins will load.
        Returns:
        the list of plugins this depends on

      • getSoftDependencies

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSoftDependencies()

      • getLoadBefore

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLoadBefore()

      • getPrefix

        public java.lang.String getPrefix()

      • getCommands

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> getCommands()

        public java.util.List<Permission> getPermissions()

        public DefaultPermissionValue getPermissionDefault()

        public java.lang.String getFullName()
